name: Contact Form Master – by Edmon
author: Edmon

sections.description:
Contact form master is a user-friendly form builder plugin that allows to create many contact forms with different fields.

** Contact form master – Fields: **

  • text field
  • number field
  • text area field
  • Address field
  • select box field

** form – Submit options: **

  • from Email
  • Contact form to Email
  • Email Subject
  • Contact form Message

If you think that you have found a bug in Contact form master plugin or have any questions, please feel free to contact us at edmon.parker@gmail.com.
sections.changelog:
1.0.7

  • Code improvement
  • Bug fixed
  • Add new form type MailChimp (PRO)

1.0.6

  • Security fixed (xss attack protection)
  • Bug fixed.
  • Code improvement.

1.0.5

  • Add new field select box
  • Design improvement
  • Bug fixed
  • Code improvement

1.0.4

  • Added new Email field.
  • Fields ordering.
  • Bug fixed and code optimization.

1.0.3

  • Design fixes
  • Bug fixed and code optimization.

1.0.2

  • Added form width option
  • Bug fixed and code optimization.

1.0.1

  • Save logic improvement
  • Bug fixed

1.0.0

  • Plugin publish
